name: LaserScan data to 3D model VR for OculusRift
name_original: LaserScan data to 3D model VR for OculusRift
description:
A walk though a Laser Scan of a small station. The scan was done with a Faro color scanner. the model was created in Plant 3D in an intelligent format.

Left Hand Thumbstick to move and jump

Right hand "A" and "B" button to turn model off an on

Right Hand "Index Trigger" and "Thumb Trigger" turn scan on and off.
